message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it! Would you like to buy it from me for $120?
I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $90 for it. Can you consider my offer?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I can do $110, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. Is $110 a price you'd be willing to pay?
I appreciate your flexibility, but $110 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $95 for the product. Can you consider my offer?
I'm willing to meet you halfway, Bob. I can do $105, but that's as low as I'm comfortable going. Is $105 a price you'd be willing to pay?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $105 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $98 for the product. Can you consider my offer?
